full_summary:
### TBIPS - A7 Programmer/Analyst - Level 3

#### Solicitation Notice

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**

**Bid Number:** PW-23-01025362

**Bid Closing Date:** 2023-03-22 14:00:00

**Refreshed Services Professional Informatics Centre of Expertise (SPICT) Method**

The Government of Canada is seeking a qualified contractor through the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement to provide a Programmer Analyst (A.7 Level 3) to work with business clients to understand their data analytics needs and develop reporting techniques.

**Scope of Work:**

The Contractor will be responsible for providing IT services to develop and implement reporting techniques, data mining, data transformation, data analysis, and data visualization. The Contractor will work closely with the business clients to understand their data analytics needs and will provide ongoing support to ensure the successful implementation of reporting solutions.

**Contract Period:**

The contract period will be for one (1) year with an option to extend it for up to five (5) additional one-year periods.

**Security Clearance:**

The Contractor must hold a Public Services and Procurement Canada (PS&P) Secret Clearance.

**Document Requirements:**

Submissions may be made in either official language. Proposal documents must be submitted electronically to the Bids Branch, Privy Council Office at: bids-soumissions@pco-bcp.gc.ca.

**Trade Agreements:**

This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**External Links:**

https://buyconnect.gc.ca/
